reviewText: Doesn't work with any of the 3D movies that I purchased.  Money wasted.

Pros:
Looks nice

Cons:
Absolutely can't fit around glasses
The colors are off, causing a "ghosting" effect.

Trust me, don't get these glasses if you're looking for quality. I got these because they were cheap but I was disappointed when I got them.
Terrible ghosting! Worst 3D I've ever seen...due to the wrap around style.  Don't EVER buy the wrap arounds!!!! Go with the flat straight type.
good product works with old type 3d movies,I have 3D TV that came with special 3D glasses,but I bought this set to watch regular 3D,but it does work and delivery was fast and the cost very cheap
